00018 #ifndef QUEST_COMPLEX_H
00019 #define QUEST_COMPLEX_H
00020 
00021 
00022 /*
00023  * creating precision-specific complex aliases
00024  */
00025 
00026 // hide these from doxygen
00027 // \cond HIDDEN_SYMBOLS   
00028 
00029 // C++ uses complex<T>
00030 #ifdef __cplusplus
00031 
00032 #include <cmath>
00033 #include <complex>
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036  
00037 typedef complex<float> float_complex;
00038 typedef complex<double> double_complex;
00039 typedef complex<long double> long_double_complex;
00040 
00041 // enable C-style funcs in C++
00042 #define creal(x) real(x)
00043 #define cimag(x) imag(x)
00044 #define carg(x) arg(x)
00045 #define cabs(x) abs(x)
00046 
00047 #else
00048 
00049 // C uses complex type
00050 #include <tgmath.h> // includes <math.h> and <complex.h>
00051 
00052 typedef float complex float_complex;
00053 typedef double complex double_complex;
00054 typedef long double complex long_double_complex;
00055 
00056 #define float_complex(r,i) ((float)(r) + ((float)(i))*I)
00057 #define double_complex(r,i) ((double)(r) + ((double)(i))*I)
00058 #define long_double_complex(r,i) ((long double)(r) + ((long double)(i))*I)
00059 
00060 #endif  // #ifdef __cplusplus
00061 
00062 // \endcond
00063 
00064 
00065 /*
00066  * creating a single precision-agnostic type
00067  */
00068 
00069 // this horrible hack is needed for doxygen doc
00070 #define qcomp
00071 #undef qcomp
00072 
00073 #if QuEST_PREC==1
00074 #define qcomp float_complex
00075 #elif QuEST_PREC==2
00076 #define qcomp double_complex
00077 #elif QuEST_PREC==4
00078 #define qcomp long_double_complex
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 
00082 /*
00083  * creating converters to/from QuEST's internal type
00084  */
00085 
00086 #define toComplex(scalar) ((Complex) {.real = creal(scalar), .imag = cimag(scalar)})
00087 #define fromComplex(comp) qcomp(comp.real, comp.imag)
00088 
00089 
00090 /*
00091  * creating doc
00092  */
00093 
00130 #endif  // #ifndef QUEST_COMPLEX_H
